data.name: RPG Sounds - Deep Sea Tales - Sound Pack
data.detailed_description:
Deep Sea Tales is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • Battle Across Waves
  • Aquatic Temple
  • Through The Mirror

Ambience
  • Harbor Waves
  • Loading Ambience

SFX
  • Action Crate Load (4)
  • Chest Open (4)
  • Kraken Attack (3)
  • Kraken Hug Ship (3)
  • Ship Creak 5 (5)
  • Ship Damage (4)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
